abstract: The sale of GE Money Bank in France would be the latest exit in General Electric’s retreat from finance as it focuses on its industrial roots.
snippet: The sale of GE Money Bank in France would be the latest exit in General Electric’s retreat from finance as it focuses on its industrial roots.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — General Electric said on Thursday that it had received a binding offer from an affiliate of the private equity firm Cerberus Capital Management for its French consumer finance business.

headline.main: Cerberus Offers to Buy G.E.’s French Consumer Finance Business
